form.label: 004-R1.1 - Security Awareness Training
form.description: Security awareness that, at least once each calendar quarter, reinforces cyber security practices (which may include associated physical security practices) for the Responsible Entityâ€™s personnel who have authorized electronic or authorized unescorted physical access to BES Cyber Systems.

search.query:
| `get_cip_training_and_members` | addinfo | eval max_time=if(info_max_time ="+Infinity", now(), info_max_time) | where last_update_epoch>= info_min_time AND last_update_epoch <= max_time | eval recipient=members | join type=left recipient,title [ | pivot Email Content sum(recipient_count) AS recipient_count SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD auto SPLITROW src AS from SPLITROW dest AS recipient SPLITROW subject AS subject SPLITROW file_name AS title | eval recipient=split(recipient, ";") | mvexpand recipient | eval has_received_update="TRUE" | fields _time,title,recipient,has_received_update ] | fillnull has_received_update value="FALSE" | eval Status=if(has_received_update="FALSE", "Needs document email", if(last_update_epoch > last_distribution_date_epoch, "Group update never sent", "Good")) | sort -Status,-last_update_epoch | table Status, title, last_update, last_distribution_date, recipient
| rename title as Title, last_update as "Last Update", last_distribution_date as "Update Sent On", recipient as Recipient

| inputlookup cip_training_materials | search is_available="TRUE" | eval last_update_epoch=strptime(last_update, "%m/%d/%Y") | eval distribution_list_name=split(distribution_list_name, "|") | mvexpand distribution_list_name | sort -last_update_epoch | table title,last_update,distribution_list_name
| rename title as Title, last_update as "Last Update", members as Member, distribution_list_name as "Update Distribution List"
